rules:
  - alert: HighCPUUsage
    expr: cpu_usage > 80
    for: 5m
    labels:
      severity: warning
    annotations:
      summary: High CPU usage detected
      description: CPU usage is {{ $value }}%

  - alert: DiskSpaceLow
    expr: disk_free_percent < 10
    for: 10m
    labels:
      severity: critical
    annotations:
      summary: Low disk space
